metadataAttributes.Title: Bayesian Statistics: Time Series Analysis
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: This course for practicing and aspiring data scientists and statisticians. It is the fourth of a four-course sequence introducing the fundamentals of Bayesian statistics. It builds on the course Bayesian Statistics: From Concept to Data Analysis, Techniques and Models, and Mixture models.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Bayesian Statistics,Forecasting,Dynamic Linear Modeling,Time Series,R Programming,
